text: @Marsha34 Reality:Texas reported 1,293 new cases of Covid-19 Saturday, its 2nd highest single-day infection rate. Texas recorded more than 1,000 cases 3 days in a row..Spike comes after Gov Abbott issued an exec. order allowing businesses to reopen.”
